definitions.definition: A simple eye consisting of a single lens and a small number of sensory cells .
An eyelike marking in the form of a spot or ring of colour, as on the wing of a butterfly or the tail of a peacock.

main_definition: A simple eye consisting of a single lens and a small number of sensory cells .
secondary_definitions: An eyelike marking in the form of a spot or ring of colour, as on the wing of a butterfly or the tail of a peacock.
